solution.text:
Circumference of the circle is \(2\times \pi \times r\)
\(\Rightarrow 2\times \pi \times r= _{{trunc(2*j*pi_val,2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r=_{j}_\)
\(Now\,area \,of\,a \,sector=\pi \times r^2 \times \frac {\theta}{360}\)
sector area\(=\frac {22}7\times _{j}_^2 \times \frac {_{k}_}{360}\)
\(\Rightarrow area=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*k/360,2)}}_\)

content.text:
Circumference of a circle is _{{trunc(2*j*pi_val,2)}}_.
Find the area of the sector of the circle if the angle of the sector is _{k}_\(^\circ\)
